title: Package Software Education Utilizing Web-Based Problem-Centered Learning and Self-Regulated Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and software installation/management experience
context.additional_context: Implementation of a blended learning environment using web-based platforms in a smartphone-centric restricted technology setting

learning_goals: Learners can propose strategies to improve work efficiency by 30% by applying advanced features of packaged software (e.g., data analysis, macro creation) through PBL tasks reflecting real-world job scenarios.
Learners establish personal learning plans using SRL strategies (goal setting, time management, self-assessment) and achieve over 80% task completion rates.
Learners collaboratively produce and present team project outcomes using web-based collaboration tools and earn peer evaluation scores of 4.0 or higher (out of 5.0).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
